title: Cozy Apartment 1
description: A bright and airy 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of Nairobi. Modern finishes, fast WiFi, and walking distance to local attractions.

title: Sunny Villa 2
description: Modern Amenities: Guests can enjoy air-conditioning, a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen, a private pool, and a TV. Additional facilities include a elevator, housekeeping, laundry, picnic area, family rooms, full-day security, bicycle parking, car hire, and luggage storage. Convenient Location: Located 8.1 mi from Moi International Airport, the apartment is a 15-minute walk from Nyali Beach. Nearby attractions include Mamba Village Crocodile Farm (1.1 mi), Nakumatt Cinemax (1.1 mi), and Nyali Golf Course (1.2 mi). Escape to this luxurious 4-bedroom villa overlooking the Indian Ocean. Private pool, lush gardens, and fully equipped kitchen.

title: Modern Loft 3
description: Stylish studio loft in a trendy neighborhood. Close to cafes, shops, and public transport. Perfect for solo travelers or couples.

title: Luxury Apartment 4
description: Experience luxury living in this spacious 2-bedroom apartment. High-end finishes, panoramic city views, and top-notch amenities.

title: Beachfront Bungalow 5
description: Relax in this charming beachfront bungalow with stunning ocean views. Perfect for families or groups looking for a tropical getaway.

title: Rustic Cottage 6
description: A cozy rustic cottage surrounded by nature. Ideal for a peaceful retreat with hiking trails and scenic views nearby.

title: City Center Apartment 7
description: Modern apartment in the city center with easy access to public transport, restaurants, and shopping. Perfect for business travelers.

title: Seaside Villa 8
description: Luxurious seaside villa with private pool and direct beach access. Perfect for large families or groups looking for a lavish escape.

title: Charming Townhouse 9
description: A charming townhouse in a quiet neighborhood. Close to parks, schools, and local shops. Ideal for families or long-term stays.
